mapper.insert: insert into user( user_id, pw, school_cd, position_cd, kor_nm, end_nm, grade, ban, birth_dt, cel_phone_no, hom_phone_no, gender_cd, email ) values( #{user_id}, #{pw}, #{school_cd}, (select concat(dae_cd, so_cd) from so_cd where dae_cd=#{dae_p} and so_cd=#{so_p} and use_yn=1), #{kor_nm}, #{end_nm}, #{grade}, #{ban}, #{birth_dt}, #{cel_phone_no}, #{hom_phone_no}, (select concat(dae_cd, so_cd) from so_cd where dae_cd=#{dae_g} and so_cd=#{so_g} and use_yn=1), #{email} )
mapper.select: select user_id, pw, school_cd, position_cd, kor_nm, end_nm, grade, ban, birth_dt, cel_phone_no, hom_phone_no, gender_cd, email from user where user_id=#{user_id}
select user_id, pw, school_cd, position_cd, kor_nm, end_nm, grade, ban, birth_dt, cel_phone_no, hom_phone_no, gender_cd, email from user
